'''Bob Joles''' ([[16 July|July 16]]: Though successful with several other roles
Bob Joles is a proficient (and profitable) [[John Rhys-Davies]]-impersonator. Apart from playing all Rhys-Davies' roles on [[Electronic Arts]]' video games
column3: Joles also took over his roles of [[wikipedia:Hades (DC Comics)|Hades]] in ''[[wikipedia:Justice League Unlimited|Justice League Unlimited]]'' and [[wikipedia:List of characters in SpongeBob SquarePants#Minor characters|ManRay]] in ''[[wikipedia:SpongeBob SquarePants|SpongeBob SquarePants]]''.
